item.description:
Hi Westport Boston Terrier Meetup Members
We will be heading to the Westport town Beach with our beloved Bostons! We can meet at our home in Westport and then head to the beach.Wear some old sneakers for this trip.It is all sand and quite messy.See you on November 1st at 10am!!!!!
Linda and Bob Bramwell
20 Truman St
Westport,Ma
508 673-5170

group.name: The Westport Boston Terrier Meetup Group

item.name: The Westport Boston Terrier November Meetup
